high.comment: The opacity value for icons with a high emphasis.

medium.comment: The opacity value for icons with a medium emphasis.

low.comment: The opacity value for inactive or disabled icons.

high.comment: The opacity value for icons with a high emphasis on a colored or light background.

medium.comment: The opacity value for icons with a medium emphasis on a colored or light background.

low.comment: The opacity value for inactive or disabled icons on a colored or light background.

high.comment: The opacity value for normal text or helper text with a high emphasis.

medium.comment: The opacity value for medium emphasis text or helper text.

low.comment: The opacity value for disabled text.

high.comment: The opacity value for error text or normal text on a colored or light background.

medium.comment: The opacity value for medium emphasis text on a colored or light background.

low.comment: The opacity value for disabled text on a colored or light background.

high.comment: The opacity value for surfaces with a high emphasis.

medium.comment: The opacity value for surfaces with a medium emphasis.

low.comment: The opacity value for surfaces that should appear disabled or inactive.
